files:
- launcher: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Jazz%20Jackrabbit%202/jjr2.bat
- wrapper: https://github.com/legluondunet/mlls-tools/raw/master/dxwnd/v2_05_39_build.rar
- gogsetup: N/A:Please select the game Windows install file, available for  download
    from your GOG account page.
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/jjr2.bat
  gogid: 1351891846
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Jazz Jackrabbit 2
    file: gogsetup
    format: gog
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd
    file: wrapper
- write_config:
    data:
      target:
        cdvol0: 0
        codepage0: 0
        commitaddress0: 0
        commitlength0: 0
        coord0: 3
        country0: 0
        dflag0: 0
        dflagb0: 0
        filterid0: 0
        flag0: 136314921
        flagg0: 134217776
        flagh0: 18
        flagi0: 136314884
        flagj0: 4096
        flagk0: 32768
        flagl0: 0
        flagm0: 0
        flagn0: 17825796
        flago0: 0
        flagp0: 8192
        flagq0: 0
        flagr0: 128
        flags0: 0
        flagt0: 0
        flagu0: 0
        icon0: 
        initresh0: 600
        initresw0: 800
        initts0: 0
        lang0: 0
        launchpath0: C:\GOG Games\Jazz Jackrabbit 2\Jazz2.exe
        maxddinterface0: 7
        maxfps0: 0
        maxres0: 0
        monitorid0: -1
        path0: C:\GOG Games\Jazz Jackrabbit 2\Jazz2.exe
        posx0: 50
        posy0: 50
        renderer0: 3
        scanline0: 0
        sizx0: 800
        sizy0: 600
        slowratio0: 2
        swapeffect0: 0
        tflag0: 0
        title0: Jazz Jackrabbit 2
        ver0: 0
        winver0: 0
      window:
        expert: 1
        posx: 725
        posy: 352
        showhelp: false
        sizx: 320
        sizy: 200
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.ini
- task:
    key: Hardware Acceleration
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Epic MegaGames\Jazz Jackrabbit 2 Secret Files\1.24
    type: REG_BINARY
    value: 01,00,00,00
- task:
    key: BPP
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Epic MegaGames\Jazz Jackrabbit 2 Secret Files\1.24\VideoSize
    type: REG_BINARY
    value: 10,00,00,00
- task:
    key: Height
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Epic MegaGames\Jazz Jackrabbit 2 Secret Files\1.24\VideoSize
    type: REG_BINARY
    value: e0,01,00,00
- task:
    key: Width
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Epic MegaGames\Jazz Jackrabbit 2 Secret Files\1.24\VideoSize
    type: REG_BINARY
    value: 80,02,00,00
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c
    src: launcher
wine:
  Desktop: true
